extension.name: Conditional Fields
extension.description: Allows the specification of conditional display of fields in CiviCRM.
extension.comments:
Developed by Frank Gomez, Michael Daryabegi, and Adam Edison. This is an alpha release of the conditional fields extension.
To use it, you must create an extension which:
1) implements hook_civicrm_conditionalField(), and 2) provides show/hide configs in files matching the following pattern: {$EXT_ROOT}/js/{$FORM_NAME}/{$ENTITY_ID}.js 3) The README.txt file contains a sample javascript implementation.
